attributes.action: Allow refugees to enter the UK without any family members currently in the UK
attributes.background: I just like many others would like the Government and/or Parliament to change the rule stating that refugees need relatives in the UK to be granted a refuge certificate or UK citizenship

rejection.details:
Eligibility for claiming asylum in the UK is available online: https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum, and does not include a requirement about having relatives in the UK in order to seek asylum.

If you'd like something else, you could start a new petition clearly explaining what it is.
